author: Pamela Muse
text:
Interested in learning what cities (300,000 or larger) are doing with public-private partnerships focused on city beautification programs.  Appreciate receiving polices, implementation documents, and the like.
Thank you,
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance of Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Public-Private City Beautification Programs
